plant.name: gridSequencer
plant.csoundcode:
opcode rw_RandomiseGrid,0,S SIn xin iCnt init 0 until iCnt > 128 do S2 sprintfk "%sgridChannel%d", SIn, iCnt+1 iValue random 0, 100 chnset iValue<80 ? 0 : 1, S2 iCnt=iCnt+1 enduntil endop
opcode rw_ClearGrid,0,S SIn xin iCnt init 0 until iCnt > 128 do S2 sprintfk "%sgridChannel%d", SIn, iCnt+1 chnset 0, S2 iCnt=iCnt+1 enduntil endop
opcode rw_SetGridScrubberPosition, 0,Si SIn, iBeat xin iCnt = 0
until iCnt>16 do SChannel sprintfk "%sscrubberIdent%d", SIn, iCnt if iCnt==iBeat then SMessage strcpyk "colour(200, 200, 200)" chnset SMessage, SChannel else SMessage strcpyk "colour(100, 100, 100)" chnset SMessage, SChannel endif
iCnt+=1 od
endop
opcode rw_GetGridValue, k,Skk SChan, kIndex, kRow xin kValue init 0 SChannel sprintfk "%sgridChannel%d", SChan, kIndex+((kRow-1)*16) kValue chnget SChannel xout kValue endop
plant.info: Grid Sequencer. Rory Walsh 2017 16x8 grid sequencer UDOs: kValue rw_GetGridValue SChannel, kBeat, kRow Gets the values of the checkbox at index, kBeat on kRow rw_RandomiseGrid SChannel Randomly changes the values of all checkboxes in grid
